metadata.title: Technical Partner Pack | Save €25/month | SanahujaDev
metadata.description: Get the 'SEO and content package' from SanahujaDev. The Technical Partner Pack includes maintenance, analytics, and authority. Save €25/month.

copy.h1_lead: For the owner who already has a website and wants to get serious. This is the 'All-in-One' solution for proactive analysis, building SEO authority, and complete technical peace of mind.

heroVisual.title: The Savings of Strategy
heroVisual.subtitle: Unify your services and save every month.

introduccion.title: Stop Hiring Separate Services
introduccion.content_1: A website needs more than just maintenance. It needs **analytics** to understand users and **content** to attract them and build authority. Hiring 'SEO and WPO services' separately is expensive, inefficient, and lacks a unified strategy.
introduccion.content_2: This 'web maintenance and analytics package' solves that problem. It unifies the pillars of a digital business (Tech, Analysis, and Content) under a single 'Digital Partner'.

incluye.title: What EXACTLY does this Pack include?
incluye.content: This is the package for the owner who wants to delegate the technical and tactical side to focus on strategy. It includes 6 key services that work together:

featureCards.title: Essential Web Maintenance
featureCards.description: Your 'Digital Partner' on guard. WPO 99, security, backups, and tech support.

featureCards.title: Visibility Report (GA4)
featureCards.description: A monthly report to understand what's working: visits, conversions, and where they come from.

featureCards.title: Authority Plan (1 Post)
featureCards.description: One monthly SEO blog post for your 'Authority Plan'. The 'SEO and content package in Tenerife'.

featureCards.title: Cookie Banner Management
featureCards.description: The peace of mind of complying with the law (GDPR) without technical worries.

featureCards.title: Monthly Snapshot (GSC/GMB)
featureCards.description: A quick look at your 4 key metrics from Google Search Console and your Business Profile.

featureCards.title: Anti-Spam Form Management
featureCards.description: Every client message is an opportunity. We make sure you never miss one.

valor.title: Real Value vs. Pack Price
valor.content: Transparency is a pillar of my brand. No fine print. If you hired these **6 services** separately, the total cost would be €130 per month. By bundling them in this pack, you save €25 every month.

ctaFinal.title: Start Measuring, Acting, and Growing
ctaFinal.content: This pack is for the business that wants measurable results. Stop 'just being' on the internet and start 'achieving goals'. Let's talk.
ctaFinal.subtext: Your success is my success. You delegate the tech, you win the strategy.

primary.text: I want the Technical Partner Pack!
